section.name: Commercial Support
section.p:
Ready-made commercial EJBCA PKI support
Support programs and other qualified professional services are provided by PrimeKey Solutions AB.

section.name: Contributors
section.p: The best way to contact the project admins are using email.

ul.li: Send an email to the ejbca-devlop mailing list.
Send an email directly to a project administrator.
Send an email directly to ejbca-support at primekey dot se.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: First of all, have a look at the EJBCA documentation resources gathered below "EJBCA PKI Docs", "EJBCA OCSP Docs" and "Other documentation" in the main menu.

section.name: Training
section.p:
Established EJBCA PKI Training
Training Courses for advanced users are held internationally by PrimeKey and their partners.

section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: There are two public EJBCA mailing lists hosted on Sourceforge. To subscribe to either list, or browse archived messages, simply click optional link(s) below.
The ejbca-news list delivers information such as the most recent EJBCA releases and important EJBCA features. This is a low traffic list.
The ejbca-develop list is used for technical discussions. Almost anything regarding EJBCA PKI can be posted on this list.

section.name: Discussion Forums
section.p: There are several public discussion forums that are used for EJBCA PKI discussions and requests for help etc.

section.name: IRC
section.p: EJBCA support questions can be asked on the IRC channel (#ejbca) on irc.freenode.net. A nice and free-of-charge, web-based IRC client is available here. PrimeKey is usually available on the IRC channel during European office hours, and occasionally at other times too.
